per_frame_1=wave_g=0.9+0.1*sin(time);
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=nahoda=int(rand(20));
per_frame_4=n_uhel=int(rand(628))/100-3.141;
per_frame_5=spoustime=above(bass_att,1.3);
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=jedeme=spoustime*10+jedeme*(1-spoustime)*0.9;

per_pixel_1=r=rad;

per_pixel_4=uhel=if(below(abs(q2-ang),0.1),1,0);

per_pixel_6=zoom=1+if(q1*r*uhel,0.2,0)+if(below(rad,0.34),-0.2,0);

per_pixel_9=dy=if(q1*r*uhel,(y-0.5)*0.1,0);
